                         if (num[j] == 0) break;
                         ans = (ans + num[j]) % mod;
                         if (j) num[j-1] = (num[j-1] + num[j]) % mod;
                     }
                     if (i < n) {
                         vector<int> nnum(400000, 0);
                         for (int j = 0; j < 400000; j++) if (num[j]) {
                             nnum[j] = (nnum[j] + num[j]) % mod;
                             nnum[j+1] = (nnum[j+1] + num[j]) % mod;

                         num = nnum;

                 }
                 cout << ans << endl;
